segments.text: Good day to you . How can I be of service today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'd like to open a Foreign Currency Account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Well , this bank offers many different accounts of this nature . There are 7 to choose from
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh dear . I wanted AUD . Is that not possible ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you could change your Australian dollars into , say British pounds and then open an account . How does that sound ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe I'll go for the US dollar account .
segments.speaker: S2
